title: Supabase MCP can leak your entire SQL database
author: rexpository
aiHeadline: Supabase MCP: Because what you thought was a secure database is now completely exposed to the world, thanks to this little feature that leaks everything. Yay for transparency!

title: Open letter accuses BBC board member of having a conflict of interest on Gaza
author: mhga
aiHeadline: BBC Board Member Accused of Conflict of Interest: Over 400 people are now urging the BBC to remove a board member, because apparently having opinions is a conflict of interest. Meanwhile, objectivity and fairness are still up for debate.

title: Google can now read your WhatsApp messages
author: bundie
aiHeadline: Google Reads Your WhatsApp Messages: Because who needs privacy when you can have Google know every last detail of your conversations? Opting out of being monitored? That's just old-fashioned.

title: SVGs that feel like GIFs
author: cantdutchthis
aiHeadline: SVGs That Feel Like GIFs: Because static images are so 2010, right? Now you can have all the eye candy of GIFs without the file bloat. Animation revolution, here we come!
